alternativeNames: Szovits, Josef; Szovits, A.J.; Szovits, Osip Ivanovich; Szowits, A.J.
comments: Actually a collector but his specimens have been named by various authors who wanted to acknowledge him.
examples: Heliotropium odorum Szov. ex Steven in Bull. Soc. Imp. Naturalistes Moscou 24(1): 567 (1851).
isoCountries: Iran, Islamic Republic of, Hungary, Georgia, Ukraine, Armenia, Turkey, Azerbaijan
source: Geltman 1990; Komarov; FE. J.M.Lamond, The transcaucasian & Iranian collections of J.N.Szovits in Notes Roy. Bot. Gard. Edinburgh, 32: 239-245 (1973), see especially the Trautvetter references for name variations.
